title: NO BE MISSION!?
body:
I dont have the be mission in my mission tab
so i cant earn my be and i dont have the orbs in my loot tab{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
It looks like you didn't have runes that qualified for the rune refund which is why you never had that mission. I know some of the info might have been a little spread out, but all of this was detailed in the [**Preseason FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ).


https://i.gyazo.com/9b0573080b0f1ffaebcbf09076b0f48e.png
https://i.gyazo.com/9bb78aed03118696a9d4cd105acc3ca6.png
